Direct Order.name: Direct Order
Direct Order.flavor: You stagger the target with a mental attack, either to provide your ally with a vulnerable target or allow the ally to get away
Direct Order.onHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Direct Order.effect: As a free action, two allies adjacent to the target can each either take a move action or make a melee basic attack with a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

Unequaled Command.name: Unequaled Command
Unequaled Command.flavor: You extend your psionic influence to everyone nearby, continually shifting the field of battle to perfect its arrangement.
Unequaled Command.onHit: 4d6 + ability modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.
Unequaled Command.effect: You can assume the stance of unequaled command. Until the stance ends, at the start of your turn you can either slide each ally within 5 squares of you 1 square or slide each enemy within 5 squares of you 1 square.

Legion's Press.name: Legion's Press
Legion's Press.flavor: You send out a telepathic command for your allies to get into position.
Legion's Press.target: One ally in the burst, or each ally in the burst if this is your first turn of the encounter
Legion's Press.effect: Each target can shift half his or her speed as a free action.
